name: .NSMP
summary: Learn about .NSMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To transfer an NSMP file to a Nord keyboard:
Connect your keyboard to your computer.
Open the NSMP file's related NSMPPROJ file in Nord Sample Editor.
Send your NSMP file to your keyboard.
You can then use the instrument the NSMP file contains as you would any other Nord keyboard instrument.
